marketing information: The Lenovo ThinkVision LT2024 20-inch LED-backlit LCD Monitor is an economical display solution for any environment. With a consistently narrow, 16.8 mm bezel, the LT2024 is optimised for multi-monitoring. Tiny PCs, 3rd-party Thin Clients and the Lenovo USB sound bar are supported with ease. For supreme visuals, the LT2024 offers a 16:9 aspect ratio, 1600 x 900 native display resolution, and VGA and DVI connectors. If you need a monitor that offers value for money, mesmerising visuals and strong green values, look no further than the ThinkVision LT202420" TN TFT
product name: ThinkVision LT2024 20-inch LED Backlit LCD Monitor
